body_html: Sorry, but is the problem that every process tries to use all the cores and this makes it slower for you? You can regulate the number of threads PyTorch uses by setting torch.set_num_threads(X) or running your script with OMP_NUM_THREADS=X MKL_NUM_THREADS=X. Does this solve your problem?

body: Sorry, but is the problem that every process tries to use all the cores and this makes it slower for you? You can regulate the number of threads PyTorch uses by setting `torch.set_num_threads(X)` or running your script with `OMP_NUM_THREADS=X MKL_NUM_THREADS=X`. Does this solve your problem?
